purpose: To facilitate the creation and management of secure and isolated environments for AI agents, ensuring operational independence and security
principle: Utilizes containerization technologies to create isolated environments, leveraging Python for orchestration and security management
reusability: Designed to be modular and extensible, allowing integration with various AI frameworks and tools through APIs
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for complex multi-agent scenarios and lacks extensive documentation
name: marinabox
description: MarinaBox is a toolkit for creating and managing secure, isolated environments for AI agents
highlight: Provides secure, isolated environments for AI agents to operate independently
